title: Obituary: Angelo H. Cammarata / Ross man proudly held the record for longest-serving bartender
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
Angelo Cammarata, the Ross man who proudly held the titles of the world’s longest-serving bartender and the Pittsburgh Steelers’ longest...
